explains: v. （组织，集团）垄断，对……实行专卖；占用（某人大量时间或注意力）；独占，霸占；滔滔不绝地对……说话

sentences.en: He would monopolize her totally, to the exclusion of her brothers and sisters.
sentences.cn: 他要完全独占她，甚至排斥她的兄弟和姐妹。

sentences.en: She tried to monopolize his time.
Wheat had come to nearly monopolize the region, but it was particularly vulnerable to the locusts.
sentences.cn: 小麦几乎垄断了这个地区，但它特别容易受到蝗虫的攻击。
